requirement.en: When your opponent draws a card during their turn, or when your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster during their turn, while you have an Insect Type monster in your Graveyard.

effect.en: Fusion Summon a LIGHT Attribute Insect Type monster by sending 1 face-up monster from your field and 1 face-up Level 9 or lower monster from either field to the Graveyard as material.
